remark.html:
Powersell test mail messages

# file

$html = Get-Content 'test.html' -Encoding UTF8 -Raw

Send-MailMessage -To igorR@rabota.ua -From alexandrm@rabota.ua -Subject test -Body $html -BodyAsHtml -SmtpServer 192.168.5.2 -Encoding UTF8

# url

$html = (Invoke-WebRequest -UseBasicParsing -Uri http://admin9.anastasiya.rabota.ua/pages/mailer/hotvacancyexpired.aspx).Content

Send-MailMessage -From alexandrm@rabota.ua -To marchenko.alexandr@gmail.com -Subject test -Body $html -BodyAsHtml -Encoding utf8 -SmtpServer 192.168.5.2
